I would like to made some modifications to the library for the category Grpd appearing in CategoryTheory.Grpd, and would like to hear any opinions on this. Here are some things I would like to change:

  • copy lemmas from Cat to Grpd and making lemma names consistent.
  • promote CategoryTheory.Core to a strict pseudofunctor CategoryTheory.Core.map.{v, u} : Cat ⥤ Grpd
  • define the adjunction Grpd.forgetToCat -| Core.map
Note that I opened #25561 a while ago, I guess this is related?
It got stuck because I was waiting for another PR to add a file about stric pseudofunctors (which has now been merged), I can fix it up if you want
Although I never touched Core I only promoted forgetToCat to a strict pseudofunctor.
This looks great! Would be great to have that fixed up.

I have now done 2 and 3, and hence (along with some other work) showed that Grpd is bicomplete. Here are the final PRs (that depend on other PRs)

https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/29282

https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/29274
